attributes.action: STOP people coming to the UK and draining the NHS!
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/health/article-4176406/Meet-Nigerian-cost-500-000-IVF-triplets.html#comments 

but this is typical of today
attributes.background:
Nigerian woman, 43, racks up £500,000 NHS bill after giving birth to IVF quadruplets in London hospital after going into labour on flight to Heathrow - hours after she was turned away from the US

Do I need to say MORE!?

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action. It is clear that you are concerned about the NHS. It is not clear what specific action you would like the UK Parliament or Government to take.  

If you would like all visitors to UK have to have health insurance, you might want to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/170532

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
